comments:
Using wtp1.5RC3-sdk-200605181223
1. Create a dynamic web project
2. Switch to J2EE perspective if you are not already there
3. Close workbench
4. Open workbench
5. Get the below exception.

Note: I believe this exception might only be thrown in the sdk version.  I don't think it shows up on the runtime version.
